duties_responsibilities.duty: Safely operate a Company vehicle in compliance with all state and federal DOT laws.
Perform complete equipment diagnostics, installation or removal on residential and commercial water treatment equipment, identify malfunctions, and resolve issues accordingly.
Represent Culligan through direct interaction with customers.
Communicate the status of equipment with customers and provide solutions.
Collect payments upon completion of services.
Assist with collection of past due receivables.
Occasional travel to area Culligan branches on an as-needed basis.
